subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The women’s coach Patrick Riml has resigned from the United States Ski Team after five seasons that included Lindsey Vonn’s World Cup title and Julia Mancuso’s Olympic gold medal. Riml, a native of Austria who took over the American women’s program in 2003, said he had no immediate plans other than spending time with his wife and young daughter.
